: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel comes down in front of DeathSteel, transforming.
Darkangel: I am Darkangel of the Tripredacus. Now what about you?
 "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...>" <raccoon7679@...> wrote:DeathSteel::

His scanner made him aware of another bot approaching. He 
transformed into bot mode and readied his shoulder blasters.  He 
aimed at the incoming bot, but did not fire.  "IDENTIFY YOURSELF! 
NAME AND FACTION!" He didn't wish to fire on a possable allie.
